previous.excerpt:
Some of you all might be disappointed that we didn't have a crazy bull day like
yesterday. Take a step back and look at the hourly time frame. GME had a huge
50+% day yesterday and dropped only <2% today. This is just healthy
consolidation on LOW Daily volume.

This is what bulls want. RSI has…
